meta.description: Strict semantic rules to prevent Euclidean violations in non-Euclidean contexts

forbidden_operations.reason: Meaningless on curved manifolds; violates triangle inequality in curvature.
Points on manifold cannot be added to vectors directly.
Difference vector is not in tangent space.
Result may not lie on the manifold.

required_semantics.transport: Parallel Transport must be used when comparing vectors from different tangent spaces.
required_semantics.derivatives: Covariant Derivatives (Nabla) must be used instead of partial derivatives.
required_semantics.integration: Volume forms (sqrt(det(g)) dx) must be included in all integrals.
